chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,
items.plainText: Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,

items.text: Therefore do my thoughts cause me to answer, and for this I make haste.
items.plainText: Therefore do my thoughts cause me to answer, and for this I make haste.

items.text: I have heard the check of my reproach, and the spirit of my understanding causeth me to answer.
items.plainText: I have heard the check of my reproach, and the spirit of my understanding causeth me to answer.

items.text: Knowest thou not this of old, since man was placed upon earth,
items.plainText: Knowest thou not this of old, since man was placed upon earth,

items.text: That the triumphing of the wicked is short, and the joy of the hypocrite but for a moment?
items.plainText: That the triumphing of the wicked is short, and the joy of the hypocrite but for a moment?

items.text: Though his excellency mount up to the heavens, and his head reach unto the clouds;
items.plainText: Though his excellency mount up to the heavens, and his head reach unto the clouds;

items.text: Yet he shall perish for ever like his own dung: they which have seen him shall say, Where is he?
items.plainText: Yet he shall perish for ever like his own dung: they which have seen him shall say, Where is he?

items.text: He shall fly away as a dream, and shall not be found: yea, he shall be chased away as a vision of the night.
items.plainText: He shall fly away as a dream, and shall not be found: yea, he shall be chased away as a vision of the night.

items.text: The eye also which saw him shall see him no more; neither shall his place any more behold him.
items.plainText: The eye also which saw him shall see him no more; neither shall his place any more behold him.

items.text: His children shall seek to please the poor, and his hands shall restore their goods.
items.plainText: His children shall seek to please the poor, and his hands shall restore their goods.

items.text: His bones are full of the sin of his youth, which shall lie down with him in the dust.
items.plainText: His bones are full of the sin of his youth, which shall lie down with him in the dust.

items.text: Though wickedness be sweet in his mouth, though he hide it under his tongue;
items.plainText: Though wickedness be sweet in his mouth, though he hide it under his tongue;

items.text: Though he spare it, and forsake it not; but keep it still within his mouth:
items.plainText: Though he spare it, and forsake it not; but keep it still within his mouth:

items.text: Yet his meat in his bowels is turned, it is the gall of asps within him.
items.plainText: Yet his meat in his bowels is turned, it is the gall of asps within him.

items.text: He hath swallowed down riches, and he shall vomit them up again: God shall cast them out of his belly.
items.plainText: He hath swallowed down riches, and he shall vomit them up again: God shall cast them out of his belly.

items.text: He shall suck the poison of asps: the viper's tongue shall slay him.
items.plainText: He shall suck the poison of asps: the viper's tongue shall slay him.

items.text: He shall not see the rivers, the floods, the brooks of honey and butter.
items.plainText: He shall not see the rivers, the floods, the brooks of honey and butter.

items.text: That which he laboured for shall he restore, and shall not swallow it down: according to his substance shall the restitution be, and he shall not rejoice therein.
items.plainText: That which he laboured for shall he restore, and shall not swallow it down: according to his substance shall the restitution be, and he shall not rejoice therein.

items.text: Because he hath oppressed and hath forsaken the poor; because he hath violently taken away an house which he builded not;
items.plainText: Because he hath oppressed and hath forsaken the poor; because he hath violently taken away an house which he builded not;

items.text: Surely he shall not feel quietness in his belly, he shall not save of that which he desired.
items.plainText: Surely he shall not feel quietness in his belly, he shall not save of that which he desired.

items.text: There shall none of his meat be left; therefore shall no man look for his goods.
items.plainText: There shall none of his meat be left; therefore shall no man look for his goods.

items.text: In the fulness of his sufficiency he shall be in straits: every hand of the wicked shall come upon him.
items.plainText: In the fulness of his sufficiency he shall be in straits: every hand of the wicked shall come upon him.

items.text: When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.
items.plainText: When he is about to fill his belly, God shall cast the fury of his wrath upon him, and shall rain it upon him while he is eating.

items.text: He shall flee from the iron weapon, and the bow of steel shall strike him through.
items.plainText: He shall flee from the iron weapon, and the bow of steel shall strike him through.

items.text: It is drawn, and cometh out of the body; yea, the glittering sword cometh out of his gall: terrors are upon him.
items.plainText: It is drawn, and cometh out of the body; yea, the glittering sword cometh out of his gall: terrors are upon him.

items.text: All darkness shall be hid in his secret places: a fire not blown shall consume him; it shall go ill with him that is left in his tabernacle.
items.plainText: All darkness shall be hid in his secret places: a fire not blown shall consume him; it shall go ill with him that is left in his tabernacle.

items.text: The heaven shall reveal his iniquity; and the earth shall rise up against him.
items.plainText: The heaven shall reveal his iniquity; and the earth shall rise up against him.

items.text: The increase of his house shall depart, and his goods shall flow away in the day of his wrath.
items.plainText: The increase of his house shall depart, and his goods shall flow away in the day of his wrath.

items.text: This is the portion of a wicked man from God, and the heritage appointed unto him by God.
items.plainText: This is the portion of a wicked man from God, and the heritage appointed unto him by God.
